name: SXZ Chris Redfield [ Resident Evil ]
description:
All the content I make is and will be completely free on CivitAI.
But if you want to support me with a coin, then you can do it here.

Trained on AbyssOrangeMix2 with clip skip 2.

Recommended embeddings:
1. easynegative
2. bad-hands-5

Strength 0.6-0.8 is optimal.

PLEASE CHECK YOUR LORA NAME AFTER DOWNLOAD.

You may use re5dfield for RE5 look (thinner jaw, light facial hair, younger) or re8dfield for look from RE Village (wider jaw, more facial hair, mature, more serious and heavier look, slightly older).

Also you may add military uniform, bulletproof vest in positive prompt for authentic RE5 look.
And you may use beard, facial hair, black coat, turtleneck for RE Village look.

Negative prompt: sepia, loli, kid, child, young

Please share your feedback.

meta.prompt: dark scene, 1boy, portrait of re5dfield, military uniform, bulletproof vest, (blood on face), angry, rim light, athletic, volumetric lighting, best quality, masterpiece, intricate details, tonemapping, sharp focus, hyper detailed, trending on Artstation, looking at viewer, realistic <lora:sxz-chris-redfield:0.7>
meta.negativePrompt: easynegative, (bad-hands-5:0.8), nsfw, naked, nude, asian, african, cartoon, loli, kid, child, young, low quality, close up, monochrome, censored, (out of frame:1.3)
